definition: Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan

sentences.english: The cons cover the hole and hide the concrete.
sentences.chinese: 团伙们掩盖了洞口将混凝土藏好。

sentences.english: If you want to go out through this hole, you have to incline your body.
sentences.chinese: 要想从这个洞口过去只能侧棱着身子。

sentences.english: It was just impossible for him to get into this I-shaped hole.
sentences.chinese: 要他钻进这个“工”字形的洞口，是完全不可能的。

sentences.english: The palmer has been Guyon's guide up to this point, his teacher.
sentences.chinese: 他的老师，即那位朝圣者只将他带到洞口。

sentences.english: He stopped at one stone of exit and could not swim any more.
sentences.chinese: 他在靠近洞口的一块石头边停下，再也游不动了。

sentences.english: The head of an enormous dog was outlined in the darkness at the entrance of the hut.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗中瞧见在那茅棚的洞口显出一只大狗头。

sentences.english: At the left of the opening was a dark and deep angle.
sentences.chinese: 在洞口的左面，有一个又黑又深的角落。

sentences.english: The young youths lounged in the south mouth of the cave for one month.
sentences.chinese: 无经验的青年们在南洞口闲荡了一个月。

sentences.english: Ouhua spring collar to the hole, on the loose shadow over the East River.
sentences.chinese: 泉领藕花来洞口，月将松影过溪东。

sentences.english: You can drop letters in through the hole in the door.
sentences.chinese: 你可把信从门上洞口投进去。

sentences.english: As this matter, the cave was closed.
sentences.chinese: 由于这件事，洞口被封了。

sentences.english: As soon as the stone was pushedaway, everyone gathered round the entrance and looked down.
sentences.chinese: 当石头被搬开时，大家都聚集在洞口周围往下看。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a cat blocked entrance, rear its ugly plunged.
sentences.chinese: 突然，一只猫堵住洞口，张牙舞爪扑来。

sentences.english: Cat's whiskers are very hard, like the wire, the energy of the hole size.
sentences.chinese: 猫的胡子非常硬，像钢针一样，能量出洞口的尺寸。

sentences.english: He had to go on all fours to squeeze through the opening.
sentences.chinese: 他只得用手脚爬才能从洞口钻过去。

sentences.english: They all stand around the hole, smiles on their faces.
sentences.chinese: 他们一伙人站在洞口，脸上笑开了花。

definition: Shimen or Shihmen township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
